Represents a specific usage of a font.

Constructors

FontUsage(string, float, string, bool, bool)

Creates an instance of FontUsage using the specified font family, font weight and a value indicating whether the used font is italic or not.

public FontUsage(string family = null, float size = 20, string weight = null, bool italics = false, bool fixedWidth = false)

Parameters

family string

The font family name.

size float

The size of the text in local space. For a value of 16, a single line will have a height of 16px.

weight string

The font weight.

italics bool

Whether the font is italic.

fixedWidth bool

Whether all characters should be spaced the same distance apart.

Properties

Default

Gets the default FontUsage, using the fallback font family.

public static FontUsage Default { get; }

Property Value

FontUsage

Family

The font family name.

[CanBeNull]
public string Family { get; }

Property Value

string

FixedWidth

Whether all characters should be spaced the same distance apart.

public bool FixedWidth { get; }

Property Value

bool

FontName

The font's full name to be used for lookups. This is an aggregate of all other properties of FontUsage. The format is of the form:
{Family}
{Family}-Italic
{Family}-{Weight}Italic 

[NotNull]
public string FontName { get; }

Property Value

string

Italics

Whether the font is italic.

public bool Italics { get; }

Property Value

bool

Size

The size of the text in local space. For a value of 16, a single line will have a height of 16px.

public float Size { get; }

Property Value

float

Weight

The font weight.

[CanBeNull]
public string Weight { get; }

Property Value

string

With(string, float?, string, bool?, bool?)

Creates a new FontUsage by applying adjustments to this FontUsage.

public FontUsage With(string family = null, float? size = null, string weight = null, bool? italics = null, bool? fixedWidth = null)

Parameters

family string

The font family. If null, the value is copied from this FontUsage.

size float?

The text size. If null, the value is copied from this FontUsage.

weight string

The font weight. If null, the value is copied from this FontUsage.

italics bool?

Whether the font is italic. If null, the value is copied from this FontUsage.

fixedWidth bool?

Whether all characters should be spaced apart the same distance. If null, the value is copied from this FontUsage.

Returns

FontUsage

The resulting FontUsage.
